title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 253 - Change Of Resident Status During Year
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 253 - Change Of Resident Status During Year

State Regulations
§ 253.1 - Change of resident status during year-general rules for filing City of Yonkers returns
§ 253.2 - Net State tax applicable to the period of City of Yonkers residence
§ 253.3 - Special accruals
§ 253.4 to 253.51 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 253

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1332[a] Codes
and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-92[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
